title: Happy Birthday, Karin!
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>Happy birthday, Karin.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Oh, thank you, Maki-chan. So, you were waiting here for me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>No, that’s not... I mean, yes, I won the... duty of being your escort for today’s party.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hehe, Maki-chan, you’re so adorable when you’re not being straightforward.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>That’s not true!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Okay, okay. Now, hurry and escort me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Follow me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Aren’t you going to take the hand of today’s star?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Ugh... Fine!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Thank you, Maki-chan. 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
